name: coloredShader
vs: precision highp float; uniform mat4 PM; uniform mat4 WM; uniform mat4 OM; attribute vec3 position; attribute vec3 normal; varying vec3 vNor; varying float vDepth; void main() { vNor = normalize(mat3(OM) * normal); vec4 pos = WM * OM * vec4(position, 1.0); vDepth = pos.z; gl_Position = PM * pos; }
fs: precision highp float; uniform vec3 color; varying vec3 vNor; varying float vDepth; void main() { vec3 light = normalize(vec3(-1, 1, -1)); vec3 fragColor = mix(color * max(0.2, dot(vNor, light)), vec3(0.7, 0.65, 0.6), min(1.0, vDepth * 0.001)); gl_FragColor = vec4(fragColor, 1.0); }
